医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
疾病预防控制中心发布新的梅毒检测指南以应对不断上升的病例疾病预防控制中心在《发病率和死亡率每周报告》中的新指南概述了梅毒诊断的全面检测方案，强调结合使用非梅毒螺旋体和梅毒螺旋体检测以改善美国对该疾病的检测和管理https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240211/CDC-releases-new-syphilis-testing-guidelines-to-combat-rising-cases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240211/CDC-releases-new-syphilis-testing-guidelines-to-combat-rising-cases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3ea46ecb-d571-4888-8668-b6f34ebe3767 Sun, 11 Feb 2024 22:24:00 -0500 CDC releases new syphilis testing guidelines to combat rising cases
儿童长期感染新冠病毒：仔细观察揭示持久影响《儿科》的一项全面综述强调了 SARS-CoV-2 (PASC) 急性后遗症对儿童的重大影响，揭示了广泛的长期症状，并需要对其患病率、危险因素和机制进行进一步研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240211/Long-COVID-in-children-A-closer-look-reveals- permanent-impacts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240211/Long-COVID-in-children-A-closer-look-reveals- permanent-impacts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4a1fe24c-b9f6-4076-8b25-14e19c89b80e Sun, 11 Feb 2024 20:33:00 -0500 Long COVID in children: A closer look reveals lasting impacts
药物再利用研究发现 lonafarnib 有效对抗 RSV Nature Communications 的一项研究从 ReFRAME 药物再利用库中鉴定出 lonafarnib 是 RSV 融合蛋白的有效抑制剂，显示出在体外和体内减少 RSV 感染的前景。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240211/Drug-repurifying-study-finds-lonafarnib- effective-against-RSV.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240211/Drug-repurifying-study-finds-lonafarnib- effective-against-RSV.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e2d117a5-782a-4289-b5ac-9634f3340171 Sun, 11 Feb 2024 19:25:00 -0500 Drug repurposing study finds lonafarnib effective against RSV
产前接触邻苯二甲酸盐会增加早产和低出生体重的风险《柳叶刀行星健康》的研究将产前邻苯二甲酸盐暴露与早产和低出生体重风险增加联系起来，强调了对消费品中使用的化学品进行监管的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240211/Prenatal-exposure-to-邻苯二甲酸盐-linked-to-higher-risk-of-preterm-birth-and-low-birth-weight.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240211/Prenatal-exposure-to-邻苯二甲酸盐-linked-to-higher-risk-of-preterm-birth-and-low-birth-weight.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0d93bcea-8c16-4353-a423-d69c147eddb1 Sun, 11 Feb 2024 19:04:00 -0500 Prenatal exposure to phthalates linked to higher risk of preterm birth and low birth weight
研究发现营养标签可以让青少年饮食更健康研究发现，德克萨斯州使用营养标签的中学生往往拥有更健康的饮食习惯，这凸显了营养素养对于促进青少年做出更好饮食选择的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240211/Nutrition-labels-lead-to-healthier-eating-in-teens-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240211/Nutrition-labels-lead-to-healthier-eating-in-teens-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=75d9d749-8a3c-49e5-ad25-e16bc2b08a27 Sun, 11 Feb 2024 17:47:00 -0500 Nutrition labels lead to healthier eating in teens, study finds
新研究发现4'-氟尿苷在体外和体内均能有效对抗禽流感PLOS Pathogens 的一项研究表明，4'-氟尿苷在体外和动物模型中可有效对抗禽流感，显示出作为一种克服耐药性并降低疾病严重程度且没有明显副作用的治疗方法的前景。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240211/New-study-finds-4e28099-氟尿苷-有效-against-avian-influenza-in-vitro-and-in-vivo.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240211/New-study-finds-4e28099-氟尿苷-有效-against-avian-influenza-in-vitro-and-in-vivo.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cba1d983-b3f5-46e9-ae96-8807d5b3c329 Sun, 11 Feb 2024 17:35:00 -0500 New study finds 4’-fluorouridine effective against avian influenza in vitro and in vivo
了解 BIOne 250：适合微生物应用的经济型生物过程控制站Distek, Inc. 是 48 年来实验室制药仪器领域的领导者，自豪地推出专为微生物应用而设计的 BIOne 250 生物过程控制器。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240210/Discover-the-BIOne-250-A-budget-friend-bioprocess-control-station-for-microbial-applications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240210/Discover-the-BIOne-250-A-budget-friend-bioprocess-control-station-for-microbial-applications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=404a7536-5d61-4f4c-bf76-3689f7bb8d61 Sat, 10 Feb 2024 06:09:00 -0500 Discover the BIOne 250: A budget friendly bioprocess control station for microbial applications
揭开阿尔茨海默病的秘密：研究指出 APOE4 对脂质的有害影响北卡罗来纳大学医学院研究员 Sarah Cohen 博士和 Cohen 实验室前博士生 Ian Windham 有了关于载脂蛋白 E (APOE) 的新发现，载脂蛋白 E (APOE) 是晚发性阿尔茨海默病的最大遗传风险因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Unlocking-Alzheimers-secrets-Study-pinpoints-APOE4s-harmful-effect-on-lipids.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Unlocking-Alzheimers-secrets-Study-pinpoints-APOE4s-harmful-effect-on-lipids.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=93de2461-ba91-42ba-9747-3ec72a6eef5a Fri, 09 Feb 2024 23:32:53 -0500 Unlocking Alzheimer's secrets: Study pinpoints APOE4's harmful effect on lipids
UT Health 圣安东尼奥牙科学院在德克萨斯州南部开设特殊护理牙科诊所UT Health 圣安东尼奥牙科学院开设了一家特殊护理牙科诊所，这是德克萨斯州南部学术环境中的第一家此类诊所，将为所有年龄段的智力、发育、认知或身体残疾的人提供服务。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/UT-Health-San-Antonio-School-of-Dentistry-opens-special-care-dental-clinic-in-South-Texas.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/UT-Health-San-Antonio-School-of-Dentistry-opens-special-care-dental-clinic-in-South-Texas.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4d184d3a-5fae-4fd5-970d-b57fb35d1ad0 Fri, 09 Feb 2024 23:19:26 -0500 UT Health San Antonio School of Dentistry opens special-care dental clinic in South Texas
TGF-β通路中的血液生物标志物可识别隐藏的肝癌风险2023 年 2 月 5 日，《Genes & Cancer》发表了一篇新的研究论文，题为“TGF-β 通路中基于机制的血液蛋白质组标记对肝硬化患者患肝细胞癌的风险进行了分层”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Blood-biomarkers-in-TGF-ceb2-pathway-identify-hidden-liver-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Blood-biomarkers-in-TGF-ceb2-pathway-identify-hidden-liver-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=98721ce9-ac50-4e23-bc4d-bf0a801dc28a Fri, 09 Feb 2024 23:14:44 -0500 Blood biomarkers in TGF-β pathway identify hidden liver cancer risk
